item.title: About bloody enterprise
item.description: Twelve factor app Modules vs Microservices About reasonable choice for architecture To read: Best Practices for Building a Microservice Architecture События, шины и интеграция данных в непростом мире микросервисов Spring Nice tutorials about Spring For example How To Do @Async in Spring
